header.text: Hi, my name is Rafael and I am a

about.title: About
about.firstParagraph: I'm a passionate IT Student and Tech Enthusiast. I love to use the concept of Do It Yourself (DIY) when dealing with hardware and software making. I live in a small countryside city in the state of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
about.secondParagraph: I've been in contact with technology since forever, as my dad was the owner of an Arcade / Internet Cafe and there I spent most of my childhood's time, playing videogames and helping when needed.
about.thirdParagraph: I am currently working as Systems Analyst using stacks such as React, Python, Golang and even PHP. Always looking to learn new stuff and improve myself.

academic.title: Academic Experience
trybe: Trybe is a web development school that has a genuine commitment to the professional success of its students. With the Shared Success Model, those who study at Trybe have the option of paying only when they are already working.

There are more than 1500 hours of training that covers the fundamental of web development, development, Front-end, Back-end, computer science, software engineering, agile methodologies and soft skills.

I am currently doing this course to learn how to learn and to code. At the end of the course I expect to have acquired a lot of experience in the area and also have a professional oportunity in one of the selected Trybe Partners.
ifsul: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia Sul-rio-grande (IFSul) is a federal institution of education in Brazil that offers great quality of education for high school students and also includes Integrated Technical Courses, such as Information Technology and Electronics Course.

There I graduated in high school along with the Information Technology Course. The Course went through a lot of content about Network, Programming, Operational Systems and Hardware Maintence. It added a lot to my academic experience and there I was inspired to do my first projects in the form of Mobile Apps with Bluetooth, Android Studio, Firebase and React Native integrations.
successEnglish: Success English is an English School institution with great prestige and recognition in my hometown. It uses the Top Notch Book Series and its tests to teach the students from Fundamentals to Advanced English. The course uses written and spoken tests to evaluate each student's performance.

The institution is recognized by their high-achieving students in the English Language, with a very effective method applied over the years. There I was able to learn most of what I currently know, and with the constant contact with the language I am able to keep a good English level overall.

professional.title: Professional Experience
madeiraMadeira: MadeiraMadeira is one of the biggest retail online stores in Brazil. It is 1 out of 19 unicorn companies in Brazil, with outsource investments treaspassing the billion mark. Created in 2009, it has seen a huge growth in sales during pandemic times

I started working there after I finished Trybe's Course and it is my first opportunity to work professionally with web development, using technologies such as React, Python and Go. It has been a great experience so far, considering the way the company deals with the remote working model with lots of feedbacks and team alignments
I am very thankful for a classmate and friend of mine who referred me to this opening, Guilherme Zobel.
renovareTelecom: Renovare Telecom is a Telecommunication Company from my hometown. The owners started the company in 2010 as a garage company and it grew very quickly as the biggest in town. It also operates in many other countryside cities.
I was hired by the company in the middle of the pandemic as an IT Intern. That opportunity was one of the best things that happened to me that year.

There I learned a lot about enterprise servers, cloning and fixing corrupted operational systems, file recovery and some Linux commands and processes. I was responsible for the installation and setup of OSs for each and every employee. Upgrades and replacements were often needed as well. Most of the things I learned I owe to my colleagues, with years of experience in IT.
kundenSystems: Kunden Systems is an Industrial & Comercial Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) provider. It operates mainly in the south region of Brazil, but there are clients spread all over South America.

There I had my first professional experience in the Information Technology area and it was really important for me and my perception of myself. My capabilites were put to test and I learned a lot with the people around me. My work had a wide range: from opening notebooks to applying fixes in PL/SQL Production and Test Databases.
